backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing frontend changes for handling success image loading, error fallback, and correct asset paths.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human‑written summaries for key frontend files including App, styles, Tailwind config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining color tokens and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point preloading the URL‑encoded success image and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Yes/No interaction, evasive No button, and a success screen showing a URL‑encoded image with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Custom hook that moves a button to random safe positions on pointer or touch interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder export because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles importing Google Fonts and defining romantic-themed color variables for Tailwind.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color palette, typography/container/animate plugins, and extended fonts, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic Valentine page, required image behavior, known issues, and feature definitions for UI and interactions.
